topic.title: Why can't I SHIFT+Drag to Spin (or CTRL+Drag to Pan) the model

keywords.keyword: FAQs - Mechanism-EditorWhy can't I Spin or Pan the model with the Drag technique?

header.para: Why can't I SHIFT+Drag to Spin (or CTRL+Drag to Pan) the model

body.para: If you preselect an element, you will find you cannot Spin your model or Pan your model with the Drag technique.
Make sure your mouse-pointer (cursor) is not above any other element before you Mouse-Button-Down to start to drag.
We recommend you use your keyboard arrow keys to Spin the model. These are the left or right and up or down arrow keys. - See also : Keyboard shortcuts
